primaryOutcomes.measure: Safety and tolerability of M5717 in the single ascending dose study
primaryOutcomes.description: Assessed by frequency and severity of adverse events, and incidence of clinically significant changes and abnormalities in safety laboratory parameters (haematology, coagulation, biochemistry, and urinalysis), vital signs (body temperature, blood pressure, heart rate, and respiratory rate), and 12-lead ECGs
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Up to day 44 (or day 55 for first three cohorts)

primaryOutcomes.measure: Pharmacokinetic profile of M5717 in the volunteer infection study
primaryOutcomes.description: Characterized by parameters including maximum observed concentration (Cmax), time to reach Cmax (tmax), area under the concentration-time curve (AUC0-t, AUC0-∞, AUC0-144h), apparent terminal half-life (t1/2), apparent total clearance (CL/F), apparent volume of distribution (Vz/F), time at or above MIC (t≥3 ng/mL), and time at or above minimum parasiticidal concentration (t≥10 ng/mL)

primaryOutcomes.measure: Parasite clearance kinetics in the volunteer infection study
primaryOutcomes.description: Assessed by the parasite reduction ratio (PRR48) and the corresponding parasite clearance half-life

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Pharmacokinetic profile of M5717 in the single ascending dose study
secondaryOutcomes.description: Characterized by parameters including maximum observed concentration (Cmax), time to reach Cmax (tmax), area under the concentration-time curve (AUC0-t, AUC0-∞, AUC0-144h), apparent terminal half-life (t1/2), apparent total clearance (CL/F), apparent volume of distribution (Vz/F), time at or above MIC (t≥3 ng/mL), and time at or above minimum parasiticidal concentration (t≥10 ng/mL)
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: From dosing (day 1) up to day 44 (or day 55 for first three cohorts)

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Safety and tolerability of M5717 in the volunteer infection study
secondaryOutcomes.description: Assessed by frequency and severity of adverse events, and incidence of clinically significant changes and abnormalities in safety laboratory parameters (haematology, coagulation, biochemistry, and urinalysis), vital signs (body temperature, blood pressure, heart rate, and respiratory rate), and 12-lead ECGs

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Incidence of recrudescence in the volunteer infection study
secondaryOutcomes.description: Incidence of recrudescence of parasitaemia following M5717 dosing

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Malaria clinical score in the volunteer infection study
Minimum inhibitory concentration (MIC) and minimum parasiticidal concentration
secondaryOutcomes.description: To be calculated using pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic modelling

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Parasite clearance time and lag phase
secondaryOutcomes.description: To be calculated using pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic modelling

otherOutcomes.measure: Genetic mutations in recrudescent Plasmodium falciparum populations
otherOutcomes.description: DNA sequence analysis of the P. falciparum eEF2 gene in recrudescent parasites to investigate potential mutations conferring resistance to M5717
otherOutcomes.timeFrame: At time of recrudescence (up to day 28 after dosing)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy men and women of non-childbearing potential aged 18–55 years
- For volunteer infection study: participants were required to be malaria naive

Exclusion Criteria:
- For volunteer infection study: individuals who met exclusion criteria associated with previous or concomitant medications and travel to malaria-endemic regions
